general.desc: Az Open Imperium Galactica indító programja, amely automatikusan letölti a különféle modulok fájljait telepítés, frissítés vagy javítás céljából.
The launcher for the Open Imperium Galactica which can download various module files for install, upgrade or repair purposes.

entry.item: Fix "E.T. Exists" awarded too eagerly after the last fix.
The AI will now pave planets.
The Equipment screen will now update correctly if the AI adds a station to the current planet.
The AI will now remove excess vehicles and houses from planets.
The AI will no longer repeatedly stop and resume moving colonization fleets.
The AI will now properly undeploy Rocket Sled 1s when upgrading the ground forces.
Fix "E.T. Exists" not awarded if the aliens detected the player first.
Fix "Nobel Prize" awarded too early because of counting the Thorin.
The AI will now properly unequip obsolete rockets from space stations before equipping newer rocket types.
The AI will no longer overfill the rockets on space stations beyond the intended capacity.
The AI will no longer deploy tanks, fleets or stations if the target planet has changed owner.
The AI will now properly upgrade the vehicle mixture on planets and will not overfill them.
The AI will no longer remove obsolete vehicles before their replacements are available for deployment.
Added missing label for when the colonists have nowhere to go when abandoning a colony.
Fixed the logic that checks if alien colonists can be resettled to another planet within the current empire.
Buying ships from the black market now adds them to the player's nearby fleet instead of anybody's fleet.
Selecting an equipment slot that is located at the bottom of a ship is now possible if the game window is small.
The selected equipment slot info no longer remains on screen when switching to split/transfer mode.
The selected equipment is no longer shown in large form when switching between fleets or ending join/transfer.
Relocating aliens to their native empire now distributes them among all their planets (instead of one less).
Added an UI toolbelt with buttons for the pavement and other features in this patch
New feature: Ability to move colonists between planets (at a cost).
New feature: Ability to abandon a colony (at a cost).
New feature: pave over larger surface features so they become buildable/passable. Use the key P to enable this mode. UI to come later.
New screen: Custom Balance Settings. Accessible via the Campaign screen or via CTRL+6 from ingame. It allows buffing aliens and modifying how morale is calculated.
Fixed Mission 17 - Destroy Prototype, where the Garthog ships would exit the wrong side of the screen when the battle happened over a friendly planet.
Fixed the database screen with stuck ship title overlapping the alien descriptions upon screen switching back and forth.
Fixed the database screen label errors when playing a Skirmish game and looking at the alien races.
Fixed the test video/screen overlapping with message playback triggered from the statusbar's Message indicator.
Fixed the test screen remaining open when loading an earlier save.
In Mission 12 - San Sterling Virus, Traders traveling towards San Sterling will now get the blinking red border too.
Fixed performance regression in rendering partially hidden vehicles.
Improved compatibility with newer Java versions.
Fixed the map editor not properly saving 1x1 tiles.
Fixed Mission 6 (Defend Achilles) not succeeding if the Garthogs flee with their fleet still having ground attack capability.
Added default defensive deployment locations for planets without buildings.
Fixed an issue with AI deploying to unreachable locations via deployment exclusions.
Fixed an issue with planets becoming non-operational upon level-up in the campaign.
Adding fighters to a planet with maxed out vehicles via the Add button now works correctly.
Added some missing German labels causing an error dialog to pop up.
Fixed a potential issue with assigning initial planets to players.
Colony screen behavior were not using the zoom factor.
Skip deployment if there are no tanks to deploy.
Text corrections.
Fix the duplicate planet Exterior 19
Fixed Trader AI overriding the script-designated chat back to the default chat.
Fixed some parametric russian labels.
Added missing Hungarian labels about the settings screen.
The button Start Battle is now only visible if all vehicles have been deployed.
Fixed the trade screen's bounding box.
Fixed the tooltip on the building upgrade panel remaining visible after clicking on the upgrade star.
AI no longer does research before level 3.
AI on easy no longer deploys tanks to the planet's capacity but only 2/3.
Fix the Escort Prototype mission not failing if the prototype gets destroyed but its escort survives.
Framerate statistics is not turned off by default. Use CTRL+F to toggle it.
Fix AI ignoring colony needs in certain energy conditions.
AI no longer builds cheap buildings (housing, food factory) in case there is an energy shortage.
Fix for research screen loosing the current technology when a research completes.
In ground battle, the start battle button now shows only if all vehicles have been deployed.
Walking around the ship now uses custom mouse cursors. Thanks @p-smith!
Scaled spacewar screen now properly displays mouse cursor over objects. Thanks @Zalewa
Fixed error in case the user and the auto-build removed a building at the same time.
Fixed tax and population calculation resulting in NaN to prevent proper planet death and causing other calculations to go haywire.
Fixed the continue button to be properly enabled/disabled after profile change.
Updated links to point to the project's new location: https://github.com/akarnokd/open-ig
Fixed planet selection box not working. The box lists all player planets and depending on the item type, it may display "No room" for spaceports and "No mil. spaceport" for ships and fighters.
Fixed wrong subtitle text in the Hungarian win video.
Fixed the +++ button not filling up the available vehicle count with vehicles.
AI ships no longer stay in one place if the player attacked a planet the enemy fleet is next to.
Fixed crash due invalid diplomatic relation entries caused by Mission 4.
Fixed NPE caused by losing mouse status information due desktop switch/UAC.
AI will build ground cannons without unnecessary delays.
AI will upgrade static defenses without unnecessary delays.
Fixed unit movement sometimes not correctly rotated into the movement direction.
Increased ground cannon damage against fighters.
Fixed crash in Mission 4 (two pirates).
Added hp-skirmish attribute to battle.xml settings under space-entities/tech to allow specifying the hitpoints of the entry in skirmish games.
Added space-skirmish attribute to battle.xml settings under buildins/hitpoints to allow specifying the hitpoints of a building in skirmish games.

Halved the hitpoints of Space station 2, Space station 3, Plasma projector, Particle Projector and Meson projector in the campaign. For example, 3 Space station 3s with 5 Meson Projectors and a Hypershield will whitstand a full strength Dargslan attack by a margin of 25%, i.e., 2 structures will survive the encounter generally while the attacker is mostly destroyed.
Fixed AI sending ill-equipped fleets to attack.
Fixed some skirmish ships to be available to alien races during the campaign.
Fixed Trader AI causing some problems with 3-way space battles (crash, wrong chat).
Increased the initial money of aliens to 100,000 cr in the campaign to to better jump-start their economy.
AI no longer produces items on level 1 in the campaign.
Switching to other races in the campaign stops the main mission timers (helps greatly when debugging).
CTRL+SHIFT+W destroys all enemy structures in spacewar (except Trader ships).
Fixed ordering of planets with issues (somehow, it was reversed and the AI operated on the planet with the best conditions, not the worst one).
Fixed AI unable to build a power plant if the missing energy was above the capacity of available power plant types.

The Map Editor for the Open Imperium Galactica, which can create a new or edit an existing map.
A játék videóit játsza le és exportálja.
Plays and exports the videos of the game.
